page.title: 15BODFARI OVER FIFTY FIVE CLUB
page.content: In April 1985 an Over Fifty Five Club was started in the village of Bodfari.The members meet once a fortnight in the Recreation Room which is opposite Bodfari School.The club was set up so that the fifty five year olds and over could meet and participate in various activities. There are thirty five members,the oldest being eighty five years old. The many activities include whist drives,bingo,guest speakers and day trips to various locations.The village school children have been invited to entertain.Part of the money from the school's sponsored walk is donated to the senior citizens.
